name: HumanFirst domains to LOINC mapping of SDOH concepts
description: Rule-based mappings between HumanFirst-defined social determinants of health (SDOH) domains to relevant LOINC codes
purpose: Supporting material for publication 'Does Clinical Research Account for Diversity in Deploying Digital Health Technologies' to show LOINC codes that could be utilized in clinical trials to document the 11 proposed SDOH domains

target.comment: The target mapping to LOINC is narrower because more specific information about race and ethnicity is required for a valid LOINC mapping.
